targets.rawSql:
SELECT
computerid,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate))  as  time_sec ,
  (CPU) as value,
  'Server CPU' as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate) and CPU Between 0 and 100 and ComputerID='1' and LastUpdate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY)
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
computerid,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate))  as  time_sec ,
  (MEM) as value,
  'Server Memory' as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate) and CPU Between 0 and 100 and ComputerID='1' and LastUpdate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY)
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
computerid,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate)) as  time_sec ,
  (Datain) as value,
  'ServerX DataIn' as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate) and CPU Between 0 and 100 and ComputerID='1'
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
computerid,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate)) as  time_sec ,
  (DataOut) as value,
  'ServerX DataOut' as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate) and CPU Between 0 and 100 and ComputerID='1'
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

rows.title: Graphs Static Device- Time Series Exempel

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec, 
  Count(TicketId) as value,
  'User Submit : Open' as metric 
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and STATUS= 2 And Priority= 10 
ORDER BY metric , time_sec ASC

SELECT
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec,
  Count(TicketId) as value,
  'User Submit : New' as metric
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate))  and STATUS= 1 And Priority= 10 
ORDER BY metric , time_sec ASC

SELECT
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec, 
  Count(TicketId) as value,
  'Technician Submit : Stalled' as metric
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and STATUS= 3 And Priority= 10 
ORDER BY metric , time_sec ASC

SELECT
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec, 
  Count(TicketId) as value,
  'Automated Submit : New ' as metric
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and STATUS= 1 And Priority= 5 AND StartedDate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY)
ORDER BY metric , time_sec ASC

SELECT
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec, 
  Count(TicketId) as value,
  'Automated Submit : New ' as metric
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and STATUS= 1 or 2 And Priority= 5 AND StartedDate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY)
ORDER BY metric , time_sec ASC

SELECT
   (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec , 
  Count(*) as value,
  'PRIO 10 - Submitted by User / Technician  ' as metric 
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) And Priority= 10  AND StartedDate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -30 DAY)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY  time_sec ASC

SELECT
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec, 
  Count(*) as value,
  'PRIO 5 - Labtech Monitors ' as metric 
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) And Priority= 5 AND StartedDate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -30 DAY)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY  time_sec ASC

SELECT

  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec , 
  Count(TicketId) as value,
  'PRIO 14 - High Priority' as metric 
FROM tickets
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) And Priority= 14 AND StartedDate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -30 DAY) 
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY  time_sec ASC

SELECT
  
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec, 
  Count(*) as value,
  'PRIO 11 - Escalated - Above Normal' as metric 
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) And Priority= 11 AND StartedDate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -30 DAY)
ORDER BY  time_sec ASC

SELECT
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec, 
  Count(*)  as value,
  'PRIO 16 - Emergency' as metric 
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) And Priority=16  AND StartedDate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -30 DAY)
GROUP BY metric
ORDER BY  time_sec ASC

SELECT
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate))   as time_sec,
  Count(*) as value,
  'Team Viewer' as metric
FROM Computers 
LEFT JOIN inv_operatingsystem ON (Computers.ComputerId=inv_operatingsystem.ComputerId)
LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Computers.ClientId=Clients.ClientId)
LEFT JOIN Locations ON (Computers.LocationId=Locations.LocationID)
LEFT JOIN Software ON (Software.ComputerId = Computers.ComputerId) 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) and ((Software.Name LIKE '%teamviewer%'))

SELECT
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) as time_sec,
  Count(*) as value,
  'Webroot' as metric
FROM Computers 
LEFT JOIN inv_operatingsystem ON (Computers.ComputerId=inv_operatingsystem.ComputerId)
LEFT JOIN Clients ON (Computers.ClientId=Clients.ClientId)
LEFT JOIN Locations ON (Computers.LocationId=Locations.LocationID)
LEFT JOIN Software ON (Software.ComputerId = Computers.ComputerId) 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) and ((Software.Name LIKE '%webroot secureanywhere%'))

rows.title: PieChart - Static Device Time Series Exempel

targets.rawSql:
Select 
drives.driveID, 
Computers.Name as `Agent Name`, 
Drives.Letter as `Drive Letter`, 
Drives.Size as `Drive Size`, 
Drives.Free as `Drive Free Space`, 
defragmentation.TotalFrag as `Drive Fragmentation`, 
defragmentation.FileFrag as `Drive File Frag`, 
Drives.FileSystem as `Drive FileSystem`, 
Drives.Model as `Drive Model`, 
Drives.Letter as `Hidden_Drive`, 
drives.ComputerID as `Hidden_ComputerID`, 
Computers.LocationID as `Hidden_LocationID`, 
Computers.ClientID as `Hidden_ClientID` 
From ((((drives JOIN Computers on Computers.ComputerID=drives.ComputerID) 
Join Locations on Computers.LocationID=Locations.LocationID) 
Join Clients on Clients.ClientID=Computers.ClientID) 
Left Join Contacts on Contacts.ContactID=Computers.ContactID) 
Left Join defragmentation on defragmentation.driveID=drives.driveID  
WHERE (defragmentation.TotalFrag > 20 or defragmentation.FileFrag >20)  
ORDER BY Drives.Letter DESC

Select Computers.ComputerID, Clients.Name as `Client Name`, Computers.Name as `Agent Name`, Computers.LocalAddress as `Agent IP Address`, Computers.RouterAddress as `Agent Router Address`, Computers.MAC as `Agent MAC`, Computers.Domain as `Agent Windows Domain`, Computers.DataOut as `Agent Bytes Out`, Computers.ComputerID as `Hidden_ComputerID`, Computers.LocationID as `Hidden_LocationID`, Computers.ClientID as `Hidden_ClientID` From ((((Computers Join Locations on Computers.LocationID=Locations.LocationID) Join Clients on Clients.ClientID=Computers.ClientID) Left Join Contacts on Contacts.ContactID=Computers.ContactID) Left Join AgentComputerData on AgentComputerData.ComputerID=Computers.ComputerID)   ORDER BY Clients.Name,INET_ATON(Computers.RouterAddress) ASC

SELECT
clients.name AS 'Åkerikonsult',
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) and PCDate is not null as time_sec,
  Count(*) as value,
  COUNT(computers.computerid) AS 'Server',
  'Server' as metric
FROM computers 
LEFT OUTER JOIN clients ON clients.clientid=computers.clientid
LEFT OUTER JOIN locations ON locations.locationid=computers.locationid
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) AND computers.clientid=clients.clientid AND `OS` LIKE '%server%' And computers.clientid=clients.clientid=1 and clients.clientid=7

SELECT
clients.name AS 'Åkerikonsult',
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) and PCDate is not null as time_sec,
  Count(*) as value,
  COUNT(computers.computerid) AS 'Workstation',
  'Workstation' as metric
FROM computers 
LEFT OUTER JOIN clients ON clients.clientid=computers.clientid
LEFT OUTER JOIN locations ON locations.locationid=computers.locationid
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) AND computers.clientid=clients.clientid AND `OS` NOT LIKE '%server%' And computers.clientid=clients.clientid=1 and clients.clientid=7

ORDER BY 'Server' , time_sec ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DeviceDateLastContact) and DeviceDateLastContact is not null as time_sec,
  Count(DeviceStatus=1) as value,
  'Network Devices' as metric
FROM v_xr_networkdevices 
WHERE UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DeviceDateLastContact) and ClientID=7 
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
    (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and StartedDate is not null as time_sec, 
  Count(TicketId) as value,
  'User Submit : Open' as metric 
FROM tickets 
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(StartedDate)) and STATUS= 2 And Priority= 10 
ORDER BY metric , time_sec ASC

SELECT
clients.name AS 'Kund',
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) and PCDate is not null as time_sec,
  Count(*) as value,
  COUNT(computers.computerid) AS 'Server',
  'Server' as metric
FROM computers 
LEFT OUTER JOIN clients ON clients.clientid=computers.clientid
LEFT OUTER JOIN locations ON locations.locationid=computers.locationid
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) AND computers.clientid=clients.clientid AND `OS` LIKE '%server%' And computers.clientid=clients.clientid=1

ORDER BY 'Server' , time_sec ASC

SELECT
clients.name AS 'Kund',
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) and PCDate is not null  as time_sec,
  Count(*) as value,
  COUNT(computers.computerid) AS 'Workstation',
  'Workstation' as metric
FROM computers 
LEFT OUTER JOIN clients ON clients.clientid=computers.clientid
LEFT OUTER JOIN locations ON locations.locationid=computers.locationid
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) AND computers.clientid=clients.clientid AND `OS` NOT LIKE '%server%' And computers.clientid=clients.clientid=1

ORDER BY 'Server' , time_sec ASC

panels.title: All Server/Workstation % Total

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
computers.name,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate)) as  time_sec ,
  (cpu) as value,
  $server as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
INNER JOIN computers ON h_computerstatshourly.computerid
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate) and CPU Between 0 and 100 and LastUpdate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) and computers.name = $server
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
computers.name,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate)) as  time_sec ,
  (MEM) as value,
  $server as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
INNER JOIN computers ON h_computerstatshourly.computerid 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate) and CPU Between 0 and 100 and LastUpdate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) and computers.name = $server
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

panels.description:
All devices on a customer
Dynamic - Need a template

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
clients.name ,
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) and PCDate is not null as time_sec,
  Count(*) as value,
  $clients' Servers' as metric
FROM computers 
LEFT OUTER JOIN clients ON clients.clientid=computers.clientid
LEFT OUTER JOIN locations ON locations.locationid=computers.locationid
WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) AND computers.clientid=clients.clientid AND `OS` LIKE '%server%' AND clients.name = $clients

SELECT
clients.name ,
  (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) and PCDate is not null as time_sec,
    Count(*) as value,
    $clients'  Workstation' as metric
FROM computers 
    LEFT OUTER JOIN clients ON clients.clientid=computers.clientid
    LEFT OUTER JOIN locations ON locations.locationid=computers.locationid
  WHERE (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(PCDate)) AND computers.clientid=clients.clientid AND `OS` NOT LIKE '%server%' AND clients.name = $clients

SELECT
clientname,
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DeviceDateLastContact) and DeviceDateLastContact is not null as time_sec,
  Count(DeviceStatus=1) as value,
  $clients'  Network Devices' as metric
FROM v_xr_networkdevices 
WHERE UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DeviceDateLastContact) and clientname = $clients 
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
computers.name,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate)) as  time_sec ,
  (h_computerstatshourly.DataiN) as value,
  $server' DataIN' as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
INNER JOIN computers ON h_computerstatshourly.computerid 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate)  and LastUpdate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) and computers.name = $server
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
computers.name,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate)) as  time_sec ,
  (h_computerstatshourly.Dataout) as value,
  $server' DataOUT' as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
INNER JOIN computers ON h_computerstatshourly.computerid 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate)  and LastUpdate > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -7 DAY) and computers.name = $server
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
computers.name,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate)) as  time_sec ,
  (h_computerstatshourly.DataOUT) as value,
  $server' DataOUT' as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
INNER JOIN computers ON h_computerstatshourly.computerid 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate)  and computers.name = $server
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT
computers.name,
 (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(LastUpdate)) as  time_sec ,
  (h_computerstatshourly.DataiN) as value,
  $server' DataIN' as metric
FROM h_computerstatshourly 
INNER JOIN computers ON h_computerstatshourly.computerid 
WHERE $__timeFilter(LastUpdate)  and computers.name = $server
ORDER BY time_sec ASC

SELECT ROUND((SUM(IF(hf.approved=2 AND hf.installed=1,1,0)))/SUM(IF(hf.approved=2,1,0))*100) AS `value` 
FROM Hotfix AS hf JOIN Computers AS c ON hf.Computerid = c.ComputerId 
WHERE (hf.Last_Date >= '0001-01-01 00:00:00') AND clientid=(1 OR 1=0)

SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM((SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM v_xr_backup_jobs 
WHERE BackupJobStatus='Completed' AND BackupJobStartTime > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -30 DAY) 
AND clientid=(1 OR 1=0))/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM v_xr_backup_jobs WHERE BackupJobStatus IN ('Completed','Failed') 
AND BackupJobStartTime > DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL -30 DAY) 
AND clientid=(1 OR 1=0)))*100,0),0) AS `value`

SELECT ROUND(AVG(TargetWeightedScore)) AS `value` FROM v_xr_sap_clienthealthchecks WHERE clientid=(1 OR 1=0) AND (Checkname LIKE 'Drive Fragmentation' OR Checkname LIKE 'Drive Stability' OR Checkname LIKE 'Drive Performance')

list.label: Server Hosts
list.name: server
list.query: SELECT computers.name  FROM  Computers LEFT OUTER JOIN clients ON clients.clientid=computers.clientid LEFT OUTER JOIN locations ON locations.locationid=computers.locationid WHERE computers.clientid=clients.clientid AND `OS` LIKE '%server%'

list.query: SELECT NAME FROM  Computers WHERE  `OS` LIKE '%server%'
